description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. full_summary:
### Title
4543-01-426-8511 Ram Potted Assembly 

### Notice Details
**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Amendment Number**: 2
**Publication Date**: 2023-02-03
**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-04-05T14:00:00
**Amendment Date**: 2023-03-21
**Tender Status**: Closed (Expired)

### Solicitation Details
**Solicitation Number**: W8482-231230/A
**GSIN Code**: N4540 (Waste Disposal Equipment)
**Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
**Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
**Regions of Delivery**: Nova Scotia, British Columbia, Canada
**Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Contract Details
**Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence
**Contracting Entity Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada
**Contact Person**: Katharine Barker
**Contact Email**: Katharine.Barker2@forces.gc.ca
**Contact Phone**: 819-939-4337
**End User Entities**: Department of National Defence
**End User Entities Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence requires the items listed below to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

*   Item 1: Ram Potted Assembly (GSIN: 4543-01-426-8511, NSN: 01-426-8511)
    *   Quantity: 7
    *   Unit of Issue: AY
*   Item 2: Ram Potted Assembly (GSIN: 4540, NSN: 01-426-8511)
    *   Quantity: 11
    *   Unit of Issue: AY

**Additional Instructions**

*   Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
*   Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
*   The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Attachments**

*   HTTPS://CANADA_Buys.CANADA.Ca/DOCUMENTS/Pub/ATT/2023/03/21/DCBD2BF65AA5388406
